channel.title: Armed Kingdom
channel.description:
"Armed Kingdom is an exciting online game you can play from anywhere with your web browser, competing against other players worldwide. The goal of this game is to become the strongest player, and you do this by recruiting soldiers, amazing weapons/armor, and attacking other players to steal their gold, all the while upgrading your weapons and technology. Start playing now!"
Alrighty, most of the time I absolutely hate text based games, but however for whatever reason this game really appealed to me. The game only came out a few days ago and is still being worked on but Join now and become the strongest.
You can join me and be part of our alliance [url=http://www.armedkingdom.com/recruit.php?uniqid=qn1182469373]here[/url]
Or:
[url=http://www.armedkingdom.com][img]http://www.areithe.org/banner.gif[/img][/url]

item.description:

The horn blows, what about the driver?

And don’t open your mouth before you try it or just because you suck don’t mean you should rip on it.
